data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Port Louis, Mauritius to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Port Louis, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Port Louis, Mauritius.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Port Louis, Mauritius.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Port Louis to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Port Louis hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Port Louis, Mauritius.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 13,008 believers in Port Louis against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Port Louis.

data.section_summary:
the state of Port Louis, Mauritius has a population of 133,800.

We estimate Port Louis has 13,008 people who might know Jesus, 30,427 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 90,366 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.
